DESCRIPTION: Finds the first occurrence of a substring in a string, from a specified start position. The search is case sensitive.
EXAMPLE: <cfoutput> <cfset stringToSearch = "The quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog."> #find("the",stringToSearch)#<br> #find("the",stringToSearch,35)#<br> #find("no such substring",stringToSearch)#<br> <br> #findnocase("the",stringToSearch)#<br> #findnocase("the",stringToSearch,5)#<br> #findnocase("no such substring",stringToSearch)#<br> <br> #findoneof("aeiou",stringToSearch)#<br> #findoneof("aeiou",stringToSearch,4)#<br> #findoneof("@%^*()",stringToSearch)#<br> </cfoutput>

Parameter.DESCRIPTION: A string or a variable that contains one. String for which to search.
A string or a variable that contains one. String in which to search.
